name: Guardian Aegis
effect: When summoned, gains +500 DEF until end of turn.
flavorText: A stalwart guardian standing against all odds.

name: Divine Barrier
effect: Grants temporary DEF boost of +1000 to all creatures for one turn.
flavorText: A divine barrier protects all who stand firm.

name: Crimson Marauder
effect: When played, summons an additional creature from your hand.
flavorText: A marauder charging into the fray without fear.

name: Overwhelm
effect: Destroy an opponent's creature with DEF less than 2500.

name: Heartlight Paladin
effect: Can switch DEF and ATK once per turn.
flavorText: A paladin whose heart shines with pure light.

name: Balanced Strike
effect: Increase ATK of a creature by 1000 and DEF by 500 for one turn.
flavorText: Striking with balanced force to maximize impact.

name: Diamond Marauder
effect: When summoned, steals 1000 SP from the opponent.
flavorText: A marauder striking swiftly to steal resources.

name: Empire's Interference
flavorText: Interfering with enemy summoning disrupts their plans.
